projectDescription: It's a team project, I worked here as a front-end developer. I developed Almost 80% of the front-end in this project. I also work on some functionality.
projectFeatures: We have core features like Forum, Quiz & Course.
You can make a Video Call & can Code on Playground.
We have a secured dashboard for users and admin separately. Users can add/delete posts and can see the analytics such as Likes, Views & Comments. Admins can manage users, posts, courses, quizzes etc.
We have a voting system for upcoming courses and also have a dark mode.
Developed a secure login system by firebase authentication.

projectDescription: Smart IT Firm is company website that provide IT related services. A user can get the desired services and admins can manage content from dashboard.
projectFeatures: Maintained a secure specific dashboard for customers and admin.
Using MongoDB and Nodejs, created admin-specific roles to allow administration.
Implemented special features like add, delete, update services, and update order status.
Developed a secure login system by firebase authentication.

projectDescription: Shabdokosh is a Online Library where users can buy and read books. I designed the Books Section along with database and Implemented Redux.
projectFeatures: Maintained a secure specific Profile for users and admin.
Using MongoDB and Nodejs, created admin-specific roles to allow administration.
Implemented special features like add to reading list and finished list with redux.
Users can make payment with Stripe.js for books to read them.
Developed a secure login system by firebase authentication.

projectDescription: Bloom - Micro Blogsite is a social website where users can make a post and with secure login system. They can also play built-in games here.

They can also play built-in games here.
